body.name: Oziral Drawstring Backpack, Water-Resistant Sports Gym Bag with Shoe Compartment and Two Side Mesh Pockets, String Backpack with Reflective Strip for Men and Women (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Saturday, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Large Capacity】Capacity: 20-35L. Oziral drawstring backpack measures 16.9"x13"x6.7"/43x33x17 cm, enough to hold your daily essentials as well as most of your sports gear. Such as basketball, soccer ball, gym clothes, swimming gear, sports towels, etc.

【Separate Shoe Compartment and Multipockets】The separate shoe compartment on the bottom of drawstring backpack bag can store your shoe, separate from other items, or you can use it as a normal pocket. The front zipper pocket can hold keys or items you need to take at any time. The inside zipper pocket can hold small valuables such as wallet, cellphone. Two side mesh pockets can store items like your umbrella or water bottle

【Adjustable and widened Shoulder Straps and Reflective Strip】You can adjust the shoulder straps to the right length according to your needs. Widened straps are able to reduce your shoulder burden and free your hands, making travel more convenient. The reflective strip on the drawstring bag can improve your safety when you exercise or travel at night

【Sturdy and Durable】Drawstring bag is made of tear-resistant and water-resistant nylon fabric material, it is not easy to scratch and tear. It also has a waterproof function to protect the items inside the backpack from getting wet
【Wide Range of Uses】Drawstring bag is suitable for sports, shopping, travel and other occasions, is the perfect choice for your own use and as a gift to others
body.description: Black Drawstring backpack This Drawstring backpack has 6 pockets, which is convenient for you to store all kinds of items in categories, and it is easier for you to take them when you travel outdoors. Shoe compartment: It is designed to store dirty shoes or sneakers separately. Main pocket: You can store clothes, basketball. Inner zipper pocket: You can store your wallet, mobile phone and other important items. Side mesh pocket: You can store items like your umbrella or water bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer good quality bag
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the DrawstringBackpack with a shoe compartment and two side mesh pockets, and it has become my go-to gym bag. The water-resistant material gives me peace of mind, especially when I'm caught in unexpected rain.The shoe compartment keeps my dirty shoes separate from the rest of my belongings, and the two side mesh pockets are perfect for holding my water bottle and small essentials. The reflective strip adds an extra layer of safety for those early morning or late-night workouts.The drawstring closure is convenient and allows for quick access to my items.Overall, this gym bag combines functionality with style. Whether you're hitting the gym or heading out for a sports activity, this drawstring backpack is a reliable and practical choice. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality love all the compartments, perfect backpack size. Also, nice and light

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! So many pockets!
reviews.reviewText: I am generally skeptical of draw string bags that I don’t see in person (and even then I don’t have high expectations for them), but this bag is like the Rolex of draw string bags!The straps are solid pieces of fabric, not just ropes, so they are a lot more comfortable. The material for the bag feels a lot thicker and somewhat water resistant (I wouldn’t swim with it, but it’s gunna survive a walk in a light rain).The best part is that there are so many pockets AND two waterbottle pouches! Gone are the days where pens mix with the notebooks mix with the snacks mix with the phone chargers in single pocket draw string bags.I love this bag and I am gunna gift them to everyone for their birthdays this year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No shoe compartment
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because I wanted a smaller gym bag but also still have a shoe compartment to keep dirt off my clothes. This is described to have a shoe compartment but a pair of shoes would never fit in this bag unless you use the large compartment but then you have no where to put your clothes. Completely disappointed with this purchase and the inaccurate description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Practical bag with multiple uses
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this bag good for carrying around gym essentials, it’s also great for camping trips, sporting events, hiking, pretty much anywhere you go and need a bag to take with you. I love how there’s a separate zippered compartment for shoes. I’ve seen these types of bags in stores but there’s no compartment for shoes like this one has. Also I like the reflective stripe on the back, perfect if you’re riding your bike, walking, or hiking and it’s getting dark outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Reliable Option for Everyday Use
reviews.reviewText: I I was pleasantly surprised by the Oziral Drawstring Backpack. It's a versatile and practical option for everyday activities, from running errands to hitting the gym.Here's what I like about it:Durable and water-resistant:The nylon material is thick and sturdy, providing protection for your belongings.The water-resistant coating is a great addition for those unexpected rainy days.Spacious interior:The main compartment is surprisingly spacious, easily accommodating gym clothes, a water bottle, a book, and other essentials.Convenient side pockets:The two side mesh pockets are perfect for holding water bottles or other small items you need to access quickly..Lightweight and portableStylish and versatile:The simple yet stylish design makes this backpack suitable for various occasions.Overall:The Oziral Drawstring Backpack is a great option for anyone looking for a reliable and affordable everyday bag. It's spacious, durable, and comfortable to carry. The separate shoe compartment and convenient side pockets are added bonuses. While it lacks some organizational features, it's a fantastic value for the price and perfect for those who prioritize function and style.Rating:5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice lightweight backpack
reviews.reviewText: This is great. We actually are able to use it to carry my daughter's roller skates. They fit well in the bag and the drawstrings work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bag for Gym
reviews.reviewText: Needed to replace my raggedy old gym bag. Saw this one and ordered it. Was able to carry my weight belt, towel in the big pouch and my earbuds, wallet, keys and phone in the smaller zipper front pocket. Has to 2 side pouches to carry water bottles. The straps can be adjusted to carry like a backpack. Good choice.
